channel.title: Math on DI Herbert Mühlburger
channel.description: Recent content in Math on DI Herbert Mühlburger

item.title: Public Key Infrastructure (PKI) – Secure Key Exchange – [video]
item.description: In public key infrastructures a common problem is that both communication partners have to have the same key in order communicate in a secure way (to encrypt and decrypt messages properly). The question is how is it practically possible to share a secret key over an untrusted channel like the internet for example. The solution is the use of asynchronous methods (public and private keys) in order to exchange the secret key in a secure way.

item.title: [video] – TEDxNYED – Dan Meyer presents Impressive Ways to Teach Mathematics
item.description: In the following video Dan Meyer (@ddmeyer) presents an impressive way to teach applied mathematics. I hope that some of our professors will watch this video and keep some of the ideas in mind. [youtube BlvKWEvKSi8] (via e-Learning Blog)

item.title: walk2Web: Linkstrukturen graphisch darstellen
item.description: Linkstrukturen graphisch darstellen Mit Web2Walk kann man sich visuell darstellen lassen, wie Webseiten miteinander verbunden sind. Man gibt einfach eine beliebige Startadresse ein und erhält die Verlinkung dieser Seite als Graph. Jede weitere Seite in diesem Graph lässt sich bewerten, bookmarken und kommentieen. Link: walk2web.com
